kit.leader_skill: Super TEQ Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +120%

super_attack.name: Dynamite Kick (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF; A high chance; of further raising ATK & DEF,; causes supreme damage to enemy; and greatly lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Stamina of the Fusion Fighter
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) Changes Ki Spheres: AGL to TEQ; (Forever) "Youth" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up; (Forever) "Fusion" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up; For every attack performed: ATK & DEF 30% up within the turn; For every Super Attack performed: Damage reduction rate 10% up within the turn; For every TEQ Ki Sphere obtained: All allies' DEF 5% up (up to 20%); 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 150% up when attacking; Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack

lines.text: ATK & DEF 150% up
Changes Ki Spheres: AGL to TEQ
"Youth" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up
"Fusion" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up
ATK & DEF 30% up within the turn
Damage reduction rate 10% up within the turn
All allies' DEF 5% up (up to 20%)
lines.context: For every TEQ Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: ATK & DEF 150% up when attacking
Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
